author: CBS News
title: Coronavirus updates: U.S. COVID-19 cases top 500,000
description: More than 18,700 people have died due to the virus in the United States.
content: Iran started reopening government offices Saturday after a brief nationwide lockdown to help contain the worst coronavirus outbreak in the Middle East, which has killed more than 4,300 people in the country. Authorities had ordered most government agencies an… [+867 chars]
